articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT crypdough.ethᵍᵐ🦇🔊X 🏴🦀
It’s an honor and a pleasure to work with the amazing folks at Pokt Network, @saugardev, and @mannyornothing to make @developer_dao Cloud a reality 
I am very excited to lead from the front and execute on our ambitious roadmap 🗺️ 
https://cloud.developerdao.com ☁️

POKT Network: We're supercharging 6 teams with $𝟮𝟱,𝟬𝟬𝟬 each & 𝟭𝟮 𝗺𝗼𝗻𝘁𝗵𝘀 of ecosystem support ⛩️
𝙒𝙝𝙮 𝙖𝙧𝙚 𝙬𝙚 𝙙𝙤𝙞𝙣𝙜 𝙩𝙝𝙞𝙨? 
Adoption is key and we're making it happen. These cutting-edge teams will create decentralized gateways using the Shannon Upgrade on Pocket

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Rohit
I just revamped my portfolio in a few mins and here's how you can do it as well 👇
With so many ideas and little time, many projects are left behind. One project for me was my web portfolio
But I was finally did it with the power of rapid prototyping and these tools:
- @framer for design inspiration
- @v0 + @nextjs for development
- @arlinklabs + @ArweaveEco for deployment and hosting
- @ar_io_network's ArNS for a domain name
My revamped portfolio: https://ropats16.ar.io/
My template Repository: https://github.com/ropats16/arweave-web-portfolio-template
